mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id AS memberId, m.login_id AS loginId, m.password, m.nickname, m.roles, mi.member_image_id AS memberImageId, mi.url, mi.name, mi.member_id AS memberId FROM member m LEFT JOIN member_image mi ON m.member_id = mi.member_id WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT m.member_id AS memberId, m.login_id AS loginId, m.password, m.nickname, m.roles, mi.member_image_id AS memberImageId, mi.url, mi.name, mi.member_id AS memberId FROM member m LEFT JOIN member_image mi ON m.member_id = mi.member_id WHERE m.login_id = #{loginId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(login_id, password, nickname, roles) VALUES (#{loginId}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{roles})
INSERT INTO member_image (url, name, member_id) VALUES (#{url}, #{name}, #{memberId})
